```{r}
library(readr)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
url <- "https://archive.ics.uci.edu/ml/machine-learning-databases/blood-transfusion/transfusion.data"
data <- read_csv(url, col_names = c("Recency", "Frequency", "Monetary", "Time", "Donated"))
str(data)
quantitative_var <- "Recency"
categorical_var <- "Donated"
data$Donated <- factor(data$Donated, levels = c("0", "1"), labels = c("Not Donated", "Donated"))
print(summary(data[c("Recency", "Frequency", "Monetary", "Time")]))
print(summary(data$Donated))
print(table(data$Donated))
ggplot(data, aes(x = Monetary)) + geom_bar(fill = "blue", color = "black") + labs(title = "Distribution of Monetary Donations", x = "Monetary", y = "Frequency")
ggplot(data, aes(x = Frequency, y = Monetary)) + geom_point(color = "Red") + labs(title = "Scatterplot of Frequency vs Monetary", x = "Frequency", y = "Monetary")
```
